h3_title: Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Old Ginseng Guai
content: If he winds up his hand to slam it down into the ground, he'll sneakily send roots your way, which he can use to lock you down and make you unable to flee from his next attack or if you're already stuck in some poison -- but using the Pillar Stance can help you evade his binds.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md', within the main section titled 'Valley of Ecstasy Walkthrough', specifically from the subsection 'Towers of Karma' and the sub-subsection 'Yaoguai Chief Miniboss Battle - Old Ginseng Guai'.
The content is as follows:
If he winds up his hand to slam it down into the ground, he'll sneakily send roots your way, which he can use to lock you down and make you unable to flee from his next attack or if you're already stuck in some poison -- but using the Pillar Stance can help you evade his binds.
